玪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lín］
同“琳1”。
[②]［qián］
玉名。参见“玪2”。

玪字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玪； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页728第16
【唐韻】古函切【集韻】居咸切，?音緘。【說文】玪?，石之次玉者。【玉篇】米石山有玪珩琪。【集韻】或作瑊。　又【集韻】其淹切，音箝。玉名。　又【集韻】魚音切，音吟。義同。　又【集韻】琳，古作玪。註詳八畫。

玉名。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玪; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 728 16
[Tang Yun] Ancient letter cut [Ji Yun] in Xian cut,? Yin 缼. [Said the text] 玪?, stone is second to jade. [Jade articles] Mi Shishan has Qi Hengqi. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo.　 [Ji Yun] its drowning and cutting, sound pliers. Jade name.　[Jiyun] Yuyin cut, Yinyin. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Lin, Gu Zuozhen. Note the eight paintings in detail.
